pkgmetadata.longdescription: Overview========.. warning:: This package is deprecated. ``os.initgroups`` is part of the standard library as of Python 2.7.initgroups provides a convenience function to deal with user / group ids onUnix-style systems.Changelog=========4.0 (2017-10-13)----------------- Deprecate entire package: ``os.initgroups`` is part of the standard library as of Python 2.7.3.0 (2016-07-19)----------------- This package is now a shim around `os.initgroups`, which got added in Python 2.7.2.13.0 (2010-03-30)-------------------- Released as separate package.
